title: kaNDavar maravarE
sahitya:
kaNDavar maravArE kaNNA unnai kalandavar piriyArE



anupallavi



moNDen uyirai uNDa mOhana kAntanE



caraNam



nIla matimukham adilE muttu nilavoLir kani naghaiyum

vElaippOlE vizhiyum adil viLangum vIrak-karuNai Azhiyum

shOlai malar pOl vanappum adan mishai shokkum deivak-kanalum

jnAlattai vasham sheyyum kOlattaik-koNDaruL

pAlitten manaiyinuL kAl vaitta kATSiyai
